snippet: The Atlantic Wind Connection will announce plans to lay a 189-mile wind power transmission line, the first leg of a  transmission spine that will run from Virginia to New York City.
abstract: Atlantic Wind Connection will announce plans to lay a 189-mile wind power transmission line, first leg of transmission spine that will run from Virginia to Jersey City, NJ.
lead_paragraph: The Atlantic Wind Connection will announce plans to lay a 189-mile wind power transmission line, the first leg of a  transmission spine that will run from Virginia to New York City.

headline.seo: An Offshore Wind Power Line Moves Ahead
headline.main: 1st Part of Offshore Wind Power Line Moves Ahead
headline.print_headline: 1st Part of Offshore Wind Power Line Moves Ahead
